subject: [Mhln] Adobe Suite 3 Design only $269
body:
All good fortune is a gift of the gods, and you don't win the favor of the ancient gods by being good, but by being bold.

Playing safe is only playing.

Great deeds are usually wrought at great risks.

Every rascal is not a thief, but every thief is a rascal.

Beauty is a harmonious relation between something in our nature and the quality of the object which delights us.

That's what learning is. You suddenly understand something you understood all your life, but in a new way.

The woman who tells her age is either too young to have anything to lose or too old to have anything to gain.

The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

There was a door to which I found no key: There was the veil through which I might not see.

Because I remember, I despair. Because I remember, I have the duty to reject despair.

It is a lesson which all history teaches wise men, to put trust in ideas, and not in circumstances.

The hardest work of all is to do nothing.

You must give to get, You must sow the seed, before you can reap the harvest.
